[B][COLOR white]Loteria Nacional[/B][/COLOR] $doregex[loteria] loteria [loteria.param1] [loteria.param2] [loteria.param3] [loteria.param4] [loteria.param5] [loteria.param6] [loteria.param7] nunguno https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg

(.+?)<|td class="categ">(\d.+?)<.+\W.+?num.+?(\d.+?)<|(\w.+?)<.+\W.+?class="rei">(.+?).+?"rei">(.+?).+?rei">(.+?) https://www.decimosdeloterias.es/ Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; U; CPU iPhone OS 4_2_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/533.17.9 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0.2 Mobile/8C148 Safari/6533.18.5 https://www.loteriabonoloto.info/ https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg .................................................. [B][COLOR white]Resultados de la Primitiva[/B][/COLOR] $doregex[primitiva] primitiva [primitiva.param2] $doregex[resultados] https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg (.+?)<\/a> https://www.laprimitiva.info/ Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; U; CPU iPhone OS 4_2_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/533.17.9 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0.2 Mobile/8C148 Safari/6533.18.5 https://www.laprimitiva.info/ resultados [resultados.param1] numero: [resultados.param2] [resultados.param3] [resultados.param4] ninguno https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg

(.+?)<|

(\d.*?)<|
(El Joker).+?"joker">(.+?)< https://www.laprimitiva.info[primitiva.param1] Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; U; CPU iPhone OS 4_2_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/533.17.9 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0.2 Mobile/8C148 Safari/6533.18.5 https://www.laprimitiva.info/ https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg .................................................................. [B][COLOR white]EuroMillon[/B][/COLOR] $doregex[euromillon] euromillon [euromillon.param1] [euromillon.param2] [euromillon.param3] [euromillon.param4] [euromillon.param5] [euromillon.param6] [euromillon.param7] [euromillon.param8] nunguno https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg
